points: Lead Software engineer for Control Microsystems, developing code for embedded systems projects using C and worked on an interactive UI written in C# to display fuel level sensor information in a vehicle
Tasked with presenting components to clients and developing requirements based on client feedback
In charge of talent acquisition and the recruitment of new software developers
Developed web services in VB.Net and refactored Visual Basic window forms from the company's old silverlight infrastructure to its new web based application.
